Maya Gans

Data Visualization Engineer

```{r, echo=FALSE} source("R/icons.R") twitter("https://twitter.com/Mayacelium") linkedin("https://www.linkedin.com/in/mayagans/") github("https://github.com/mayagans/") ```

Biography

I am currently a Data Visualization Engineer at Atorus Research where I develop custom applications using R and JavaScript. As an RStudio intern I designed [TidyBlocks](https://tidyblocks.tech), a visual block based programming language. I also co-wrote [JavaScript for Data Science](https://github.com/software-tools-books/js4ds). I use `ggplot2` and `d3.js` to create music related infographics for [JamBase.com](https://www.jambase.com/article/new-orleans-jazz-fest-after-dark-deep-dive). When I'm not coding, I'm climbing tall mountains.
Interests
  • JavaScript
  • d3.js
  • Shiny
  • Playing bass
  • Rock climbing
